name: NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey
desc: These constants identify key-value pairs used to add vocabulary to the dictionary using addSpeechDictionary(_:).

items.name: static let abbreviations: NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey
items.desc: An array of dictionary objects containing the keys entrySpelling and entryPhonemes.

items.name: static let entryPhonemes: NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey
items.desc: The phonemic representation of an entry. An NSString.

items.name: static let entrySpelling: NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey
items.desc: The spelling of an entry. An NSString.

items.name: static let localeIdentifier: NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey
items.desc: The canonical locale identifier string describing the dictionary's locale. A locale is generally composed of three pieces of ordered information: a language code, a region code, and a variant code. Refer to documentation about NSLocale or Internationalization and Localization Guide for more information

items.name: static let modificationDate: NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey
items.desc: A string representation of the dictionary's last modification date in the international format (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS Â±HHMM). If the same word appears across multiple dictionaries, the one from the dictionary with the most recent date will be used.

items.name: static let pronunciations: NSSpeechSynthesizer.DictionaryKey
items.desc: An array of dictionary objects containing the keys entrySpelling and entryPhonemes.
